results.name: 2 * x-coordinate of the points of a counterclockwise spiral on an hexagonal grid.
comment: The Cartesian coordinates of the points of a counterclockwise spiral on an hexagonal grid are given by x(n) = a(n)/2 and by y(n)= A307012(n) * sqrt(3)/2.
